sn2.11:1.2: Then, late at night, the glorious god Candimasa, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha, bowed, stood to one side,
sn2.11:1.3: and recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.11:2.2: they will reach a safe place
sn2.11:3.1: “Like fish when the net is cut,
sn2.11:3.2: they will reach the far shore
